text: Brent Michael Bowden (born May 21, 1987 in Huntsville, Alabama) is an American football Punter that is currently a free agent in the National Football League (NFL). Bowden was drafted out of the Virginia Tech University with the 172nd pick in the sixth round of the 2010 NFL Draft by the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. ==Other websites== *Brent Bowden at nfl.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players Category:American football punters Category:Sportspeople from Huntsville, Alabama
title: Brent Bowden
